title: Cinnamon doughnuts with cinnamon ice cream and chocolate sauce
description: A cinnamon-lover's dream come true: cinnamon doughnuts and ice-cream set off by a rich chocolate sauce.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need an ice cream maker.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out using a knife
300ml/10½fl oz double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
